description: A massive island-sized ship commanded by Gecko Moria, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. It serves as a haunted fortress filled with zombies and is located in the mysterious Florian Triangle.

keyEvents.title: Zoro's Sacrifice on Thriller Bark
keyEvents.description: In a secluded area of Thriller Bark, Zoro absorbs all of Luffy's accumulated pain from Bartholomew Kuma, creating one of the most iconic moments in One Piece history.
keyEvents.significance: Thriller Bark becomes the stage for one of the series' most defining moments of loyalty and sacrifice, cementing its place in One Piece lore.

keyEvents.title: The 'Nothing Happened' Scene
keyEvents.description: Sanji discovers Zoro standing alone in a pool of blood on Thriller Bark, where Zoro delivers his legendary 'Nothing... happened' line.
keyEvents.significance: The location where one of anime's most iconic scenes takes place, making this specific spot on Thriller Bark legendary among fans.

statusHistory.reason: Thriller Bark is operational during the arc
